resources.string: We just need a postal address so the postman can find you.

Here you can find a list of the transfers that are in progress of have heen successfully completed.
To get your passengers payments, please tell us how you want us to send the money.
If you don\u0027t yet have a PayPal account,enter your email address and you\u0027ll have receive an email enabling you to create one.
Get your money directly to the bank account of your choice. you\u0027ll see it in your account in 1-5 weekdays.
Here you can find a list of your payments made on BlaBlaCar, as well as any pending or completed refunds.
We automatically send your money 48 hours after departure time. You\u0027ll see the money in your bank or PayPal account in 1 to 5 weekdays.
